name: src/App.js
addMiddlewares
description: adds the provided functions to the list of Koa middlewares to be executed for all routes.

name: addMiddleware
description: adds the provided function to the list of Koa middlewares to be executed for all routes.

name: mountFolder
description:
"mounts" a folder, scanning it for route files, then adding the discovered routes to the app.
      a route is a class which extends {@link Route}

params.name: pathFolder
params.description: the path of the folder to mount

params.name: prefix
params.description: an optional prefix to prepend to all of the folder's routes

name: start
description: Launches the app and starts listening on the configured port.

name: src/index.js
src/middlewares/addDefaultBody.js
addDefaultBody
description: middleware setting a default starting body

params.name: body
params.description: The default body to persist through the app

name: src/middlewares/handleError.js

properties.name: logAll
properties.description: if set to true, all logs will be displayed regardless of their individual settings

properties.name: logErrorUnknown
properties.description: whether unknown errors should be displayed

properties.name: logErrorSequelize
properties.description: whether errors pertaining to the models should be logged

properties.name: logErrorApp
properties.description: whether errors coming from thrown {@link ErrorApp} should be logged

name: handleError
description: middleware handling various errors, turning them into readable messages

params.name: opt
params.description: option object to set which events should be logged

name: src/middlewares/index.js
src/middlewares/logger.js
logger
description: middleware handling logging each time a request is made

name: src/middlewares/notFound.js
notFound
description: middleware preventingly setting the response's status to 404, in case no path is picked up

name: src/routes/Route.js

properties.name: params
properties.description:
the params describing the route's middlewares,
                                                               with the key being the param's name,
                                                               and the value describes the way it should be handled.
                                                               (only applicable for requests containing a body)

properties.name: path
properties.description: the path at which the route will be available.

properties.name: routeBase
properties.description: a prefix which will be preppended to the route's path

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: if set to true, the route will be ignored

properties.name: middlewares
properties.description: an array of Koa Middlewares, which will be mounted for the given route

properties.name: rateLimit
properties.description: a rateLimit object, which lets the user describe the max rate at which a user can access the route

properties.name: __func
properties.description: an array of functions which provides "middleware" functions that will be applied to the corresponding parameter one by one.

properties.name: __force
properties.description: whether the parameter is required or not.

params.name: elem
params.description: the element the function will act upon

return.description: transformedParam the parameter, after being manipulated by the function

properties.name: prefix
properties.description: a prefix which will be preppended before every route's paths

properties.name: routes
properties.description: an array containing all the mounted Routes

properties.name: models
properties.description: an array containing all of the app's models

properties.name: model
properties.description: the name of the route's own model

properties.name: boolean
properties.description: whether the route should be disabled

name: Get
description: mounts the tagged function as a GET route.

name: Post
description: mounts the tagged function as a POST route.

name: Put
description: mounts the tagged function as a PUT route.

name: Patch
description: mounts the tagged function as a PATCH route.

name: Delete
description: mounts the tagged function as a DELETE route.

name: Route
description: used to set some parameters on an entire class.The supported parameters are middlewares, disable, and routeBase.

name: mount
description:
Register the route and makes it callable once the API is launched.
      you will usually not need to call this method yourself.

name: beforeRoute
description: a member that can be overriden, which will always be executed before the route is accessed

params.name: params
params.description: an object containing all route parameters

params.name: next
params.description: the next middleware in the chain

name: paramsGet
description: retrieves the query params in a GET request

name: send
description: sets the response's body (with a message + data field) and status .

params.name: status
params.description: the HTTP status code to end the request with

params.name: data
params.description: the data to be yielded by the requests

params.name: message
params.description: the message to be yielded by the request

name: sendOk
description: same as {@link send}, but automatically sets the status to 200 OK

params.name: data
params.description: the data to be yielded by the requests

params.name: message
params.description: the message to be yielded by the request

name: sendCreated
description: same as {@link send}, but automatically sets the status to 201 CREATED

params.name: data
params.description: the data to be yielded by the requests

params.name: message
params.description: the message to be yielded by the request

name: sendNoContent
description: replies with an empty body, yielding 204 NO CONTENT as the status

name: sendBadRequest
description: same as {@link send}, but automatically sets the status to 400 BAD REQUEST

params.name: data
params.description: the data to be yielded by the requests

params.name: message
params.description: the message to be yielded by the request

name: sendUnauthorized
description: same as {@link send}, but automatically sets the status to 401 UNAUTHORIZED

params.name: data
params.description: the data to be yielded by the requests

params.name: message
params.description: the message to be yielded by the request

name: sendForbidden
description: same as {@link send}, but automatically sets the status to 403 FORBIDDEN

params.name: data
params.description: the data to be yielded by the requests

params.name: message
params.description: the message to be yielded by the request

name: sendNotFound
description: same as {@link send}, but automatically sets the status to 404 NOT FOUND

params.name: data
params.description: the data to be yielded by the requests

params.name: message
params.description: the message to be yielded by the request

name: sendInternalServerError
description: same as {@link send}, but automatically sets the status to 500 INTERNAL SERVER ERROR

params.name: data
params.description: the data to be yielded by the requests

params.name: message
params.description: the message to be yielded by the request

name: throw
description: throws a formated error to be caught.

params.name: translate
params.description: indicates whether the message should be translated or not

name: assert
description: checks a condition. If it evaluates to false, throws a formated error to be caught.

params.name: condition
params.description: if set to false; assert will fail and throw.

params.name: translate
params.description: indicates whether the message should be translated or not

throws.description: thrown error, should the assert fail.

name: src/routes/RouteDecorators.js
src/utils/ErrorApp.js
src/utils/StatusCode.js
src/utils/index.js
src/utils/utils.js
random
description: generates a random number configurable range and floating precision

name: capitalize
description: turns the first letter of every words into capital letters

name: dateYYYYMMDD
description: converts a javascript date to the YYYY-MM-DD format

name: isArray
description: checks if the given param is an array

name: trim
description: trim the given element if possible

name: isObject
description: checks whether the given element is an objects

params.name: force
params.description: if set to true, will first check that obj is not an array.

name: isEmpty
description: checks whether the given element is empty

name: notEmpty
description: checks whether the given element is NOT empty

name: nullIfEmpty
description: checks whether the given element is empty, and return null if it is.

name: jsonEncode
description: transforms a JSON element intro a string

name: jsonDecode
description: transforms JSON string into a JSON element

name: toNumber
description: converts the given element to a number

name: deepCopy
description: copy an object recursively

return.description: a deep copy of the supplied object

name: objValToArray
description: transforms an Object into an array of key-value pairs

name: src/utils/utils.param.js
test
description: allows the user to enforce a test on an object, and throws an error should the check fail.

params.name: func
params.description: the predicate to check the object

params.name: errMsg
params.description: the error message to be returned in case the check fails.

return.description: a function that can be supplied to a route's param checks

throws.description: thrown if the test predicate returns false

name: trasform
description: allows the user to apply an arbitrary function to an elem.

params.name: func
params.description: the function to transform the object

return.description: a function that can be supplied

name: regex
description: allows the user to check whether an element matches the given regex.

return.description: a function taking a string, which will attempt to match it against the given regex, and returns true or false.

name: isDateBetween
description: allows the user to check whether a given date is between a range of dates.

return.description: a function taking a date, which will return true if it is between the first two supplied, false otherwise.

name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "koa-smart",
  "version": "1.2.0",
  "people": {
    "name": "YSO CORP",
    "email": "contact@ysocorp.com",
    "url": "http://ysocorp.com"
  },
  "description": "A framework base on Koajs2 with Decorator, Params checker and a base of modules (cors, bodyparser, compress, I18n, etc) to let you develop smart api easily",
  "license": "MIT",
  "main": "index.js",
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=7.10.1"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/ysocorp/koa-smart"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "test": "npm run build-prod && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha --opts mocha.opts",
    "build-prod": "rimraf dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel src --out-dir dist",
    "lint": "eslint src test",
    "generate-doc": "npx esdoc"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "babel-runtime": "^6.26.0",
    "chalk": "^2.3.2",
    "jsonwebtoken": "^8.2.0",
    "kcors": "^2.2.0",
    "koa": "^2.5.0",
    "koa-bodyparser": "^4.2.0",
    "koa-compress": "^2.0.0",
    "koa-helmet": "^3.3.0",
    "koa-i18n": "^2.1.0",
    "koa-locale": "^1.3.0",
    "koa-router": "^7.4.0",
    "koa2-ratelimit": "^0.5.0",
    "lodash": "^4.17.5",
    "moment": "^2.21.0",
    "node-gettext": "^2.0.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-cli": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-eslint": "^8.2.2",
    "babel-plugin-transform-class-properties": "^6.23.0",
    "babel-plugin-transform-decorators-legacy": "^1.3.4",
    "babel-plugin-transform-runtime": "^6.15.0",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.6.1",
    "babel-preset-stage-3": "^6.17.0",
    "nodemon": "^1.17.1",
    "mocha": "^5.0.4",
    "expect": "^22.4.0",
    "eslint": "^4.18.2",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.0.4",
    "cross-env": "^5.1.4",
    "rimraf": "^2.6.2",
    "supertest": "^3.0.0"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "koa-smart",
    "koa-boilerplate",
    "koajs-boilerplate",
    "koa2-boilerplate",
    "boilerplate",
    "koa-decorator",
    "koa2-decorator",
    "koajs-2-decorator",
    "koajs",
    "koa-es6",
    "koa-es7",
    "koajs-2",
    "restfull",
    "api",
    "class",
    "decorator",
    "koa-essential",
    "koa-router",
    "framework",
    "router"
  ]
}
name: package.json
